about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Jericho rank 17 tackler “Baphomet”
  • Special weapon “Missile module Trinity”
  • Active module “Ties of Shadows”
  • Unique modifier “Baphomet” shield recuperator”
  • Unique modifier “Baphomet pulse discharge”
  • Unique portrait “Sectator”
  • Pattern “Threads of power”
  • Decor “Greedy one”
  • Permanent credit reward bonus +10%

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Inhibitor beam
  • Shield booster M
  • Target painter
  • Vernier engines
  • Collision compensator
  • Emergency barrier
  • Adaptive shield
  • Multipurpose shield
  • Crystal plates
  • Proton wall

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

For a very long time the Yith'got Witnesses seemed to be an almost harmless cult. People saw its danger mainly in attempts to control things beyond their understanding, as well as in the threat of the Liu-virus infection and its spread.

The Yith'got Witnesses recruited a huge number of people, after which they started a massacre in dozens of sectors. All these killings occurred near the ruins of the Precursors. Using the captured clone creation machine, the cultists have stained an entire Precursor obelisk with blood.

It was then that unique fighters started to appear among their ships. These fighters were named “Baphomet” for their appearance and, from the point of view of ordinary people, completely otherworldly capabilities.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Jericho rank 17 tackler “Baphomet”
  • Special weapon “Missile module Trinity”
  • Active module “Ties of Shadows”
  • Unique modifier “Baphomet” shield recuperator”
  • Unique modifier “Baphomet pulse discharge”
  • Unique portrait “Sectator”
  • Pattern “Threads of power”
  • Decor “Greedy one”
  • Permanent credit reward bonus +10%

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Inhibitor beam
  • Shield booster M
  • Target painter
  • Vernier engines
  • Collision compensator
  • Emergency barrier
  • Adaptive shield
  • Multipurpose shield
  • Crystal plates
  • Proton wall

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

For a very long time the Yith'got Witnesses seemed to be an almost harmless cult. People saw its danger mainly in attempts to control things beyond their understanding, as well as in the threat of the Liu-virus infection and its spread.

The Yith'got Witnesses recruited a huge number of people, after which they started a massacre in dozens of sectors. All these killings occurred near the ruins of the Precursors. Using the captured clone creation machine, the cultists have stained an entire Precursor obelisk with blood.

It was then that unique fighters started to appear among their ships. These fighters were named “Baphomet” for their appearance and, from the point of view of ordinary people, completely otherworldly capabilities.
name: Star Conflict - Baphomet (Deluxe edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

*languages with full audio support
